content: how do i…… q change color a on the stitch before you are to change color work the stitch until you are to the last yarn over to complete the stitch pick up the new color and yarn over with it holding both colors of yarn securely behind your work and pull through to complete the stitch pull the tail of both the old color and new across the top of the row below in order to secure them and draw up the next loop of the new color in the next stitch continue to work in this manner for several stitches in order to secure yarn ends by copperscaledragon copperscaledrago ravelry id
